## rangeUtf8() function

Creates a Parser that matches a single character from a range of codepoints.

Use `recognize` if you need the character that was matched.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rangeUtf8(firstCodePoint: number, lastCodePoint: number, expected?: string[]): Parser<void, ArrayLike<number>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  firstCodePoint | number | The first code point to accept |
|  lastCodePoint | number | The last code point to accept (inclusive) |
|  expected | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Parser](./prsc.parser.md)<!-- -->&lt;void, ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;&gt;
